definitions.text: a slight depression in the smoothness of a surface
examples: ironing gets rid of most wrinkles
they finally have the wrinkles pretty well ironed out

definitions.text: a clever method of doing something (especially something new and different)
gather or contract into wrinkles or folds; pucker
make wrinkles or creases on a smooth surface; make a pressed, folded or wrinkled line in
examples: crease the paper like this to make a crane

definitions.text: become wrinkled or crumpled or creased
